author: patrickl
msg: - Launcher command line arguments are added to the Ant user properties so that they can be used in the XML file
- Added a "useargs" attribute to the "launch" task so that the passing of the Launcher command line arguments to the child JVM can be disabled
- Rename all "public final static" field names to be uppercase to conform to standard Java coding practices

author: patrickl
msg: Separate out methods in SysPropertySet class that can be reused by other similar classes

author: patrickl
msg: Move nested elements and data types to a separate package instead of being embedded in the LaunchTask class.
This commit was manufactured by cvs2svn to create tag 'J2EE_14_03'.

author: patrickl
msg: Add support for sharing system properties among multiple targets using the <syspropertyset> data type.
